name: Lunar Cycles Unending
title: Azhdaha: Lunar Cycles Unending
desc: "Today is the day... We settle this now!"

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against Azhdaha at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Azhdaha, play this card on them. Attach <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization to Azhdaha, then create 1 Elemental Die for each Elemental Type your characters have.(Deck must contain Azhdaha to add this card to it)
